titleStmt.title: A letter written to Dr. Burnet, giving an account of Cardinal Pool's secret powers from which it appears, that it was never intended to confirm the alienation that was made of abbeylands : to which are added, two breves that Card. Pool brought over, and some other of his letters, that were never before printed.
titleStmt.author: Coventry, William, Sir, 1628?-1686.
Pole, Reginald, 1500-1558.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
